item.title: An Introduction to Kidney Paired Donation, with ompr and ggraph
item.description: Code for this worked example can be found on Github While most of my work posted here over the past year has been inspired by hockey statistics, the majority of my time is spent doing actual work on a much more important problem. Letâ€™s say you know someone in need of a kidney transplant, and after careful reflection on the risks, you are willing to donate one of your kidneys to your friend.
